    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method for the entire program. Loops through original protein sequences and processes any that have not already been processed in the first pass. Manages the threadpool. Calls SingleGoProteinProcessingThread. Loads and processes Go codes and accessions hits.
        Parameters:
        args -

      • getSequences

        public static void getSequences(java.io.File inSequencesFile,
                java.util.List<Protein> proteinList)
        Loads all protein sequences from a file into a List of Proteins.
        Parameters:
        inSequencesFile - The file from which to load the protein sequences.
        proteinList - The List of Proteins

      • getAccessionIds

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getAccessionIds(java.io.File blastDataInFile)
        reads and parses the passed file to extract a global map of all accession hits in that blast 2 go output file.
        Parameters:
        blastDataInFile -
        Returns:
        accessionIds a Map> where the primary key is the FastaName of a proteins sequence and the value is a Map of all accession hits and their respective eValues for the protein identified by its FastaName.

      • parseHits

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parseHits(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> accessionIds,
                                                         java.lang.String doc)
        parses a single searched sequences data entry in a blast to go file's output to extract all accessions for that searched sequence.
        Parameters:
        doc - a string representing all the data in a blast 2 go output file for a single searched sequence.
        Returns:
        allHitsOfOneQuery a Map of all accessions for this sequence by accession key and eValue value.

      • getGOAnnotations

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getGOAnnotations(java.io.File blastAnnotationsInFile)
        Reads, cleans and parses a blast 2 go annotation file to extract a global map of all go codes and go names and associate them with the sequence they are associated with.
        Parameters:
        blastAnnotationsInFile - a blast 2 go annotations file in "sequence" output form
        Returns:
        goAnnotations A Map> where the primary key is the FastaName of a proteins sequence and the value is a Map of all go codes associated with that sequence by the blast 2 go mapper and annotator as the key and the value is the respective go annotation name for that go code.

      • trim

        public static void trim(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> currentAccessionIds,
        double thresholdEValue)
        trims the accessions list for a particular searched sequence down to only those with an eValue less than the threshold eValue, only these are returned for further processing.
        Parameters:
        currentAccessionIds - the Map of accessions and eValues extracted from the blast 2 go output for a particular sequence
        thresholdEValue - the cutoff eValue over which we ignore all hits as possible/probable coincidences.
